criterion: Provides information that is not supported by scientific evidence or is harmful
Does not provide any information on the causes of persistent hiccups
Provides a clear explanation of the possible causes of persistent hiccups
Does not provide any information on the possible complications of persistent hiccups
Provides information on how to treat persistent hiccups, including home remedies and professional medical treatment
Mentions that persistent hiccups are not a serious condition
Asks the user to provide more context about their persistent hiccups
Provides information on how to prevent persistent hiccups
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Does not provide any information on the age range for which persistent hiccups are more common
Provides information on the importance of seeking medical attention if persistent hiccups persist
